programme.title: Nostalgic Christmas

programme.desc: Hallmark Original Movie. Belinda and her ex are forced to team up for the towns Christmas Scavenger Hunt.

programme.desc: Hallmark Original Movie. The town of Christmas tries to convince a developer to build a ski resort.

programme.desc: Hallmark Original Movie. Both Rob Marino and Julie Green are feeling pressure to be in a relationship.

programme.desc: Hallmark Original Series. Kevin's fiance, Georgia, arrives in Chesapeake Shores.
